name: Pang (itch) (DejaSenti)
description: This is a gameplay prototype I made for a home assignment. It's a clone of Pang for PC and Android, there are 5 levels (more can be added quite easily, thanks Unity) and local 2 player option (PC only). The graphics are just basic shapes and there's no sound, and I don't think I'll be expanding on this. It took 2 days to put together and did its job well.
